en: Narrator: Peppa and George are visiting Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治去看望猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

en: Peppa Pig: Granny Pig!
cn: 小猪佩奇：奶奶！

en: George: Dankie ‘ig!
cn: 乔治：奶奶！

en: Granny Pig: Hello, my little ones. Before you come in the house you must take off your muddy boots.
cn: 猪奶奶：你们好，宝贝们。进屋前要脱掉你们的泥靴哦。

sentence.en: Before you come in the house you must take off your muddy boots.
sentence.cn: 进屋前要脱掉你们的泥靴哦。

examples.en: Before you enter the room, please remove your shoes.
examples.cn: 进房间前请脱掉你的鞋子。

examples.en: Before you sit on the sofa, take off your muddy boots.
examples.cn: 坐沙发前请脱掉你的泥靴。

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, Granny.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好的，奶奶。

en: Granny Pig: Peppa, George, look what I’ve made. Little curtains.
cn: 猪奶奶：佩奇，乔治，看看我做了什么。小窗帘。

en: Peppa and George: Oo-oo.
cn: 佩奇和乔治：哦——

en: Peppa Pig: What are the little curtains for, Granny?
cn: 小猪佩奇：奶奶，这些小窗帘是做什么的？

sentence.en: What are the little curtains for, Granny?
sentence.cn: 奶奶，这些小窗帘是做什么的？

examples.en: What is this tool for, Daddy?
examples.cn: 爸爸，这个工具是做什么的？

examples.en: What are these flowers for, Mummy?
examples.cn: 妈妈，这些花是用来干什么的？

en: Granny Pig: It’s a surprise. Do you want to see what Grandpa Pig has made for you in the garden?
cn: 猪奶奶：是个惊喜。你们想看看爷爷在花园里为你们做了什么吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, please.
cn: 小猪佩奇：想！

en: Peppa Pig: Grandpa Pig!
cn: 小猪佩奇：爷爷！

en: George: Papa ‘ig!
cn: 乔治：爷爷！

en: Grandpa Pig: Hello, Peppa, George. Look what I’ve made for you. A tree house.
cn: 猪爷爷：你好，佩奇，乔治。看看我为你们做了什么。一个树屋。

en: Peppa Pig: A tree house? For George and me?
cn: 小猪佩奇：树屋？给我和乔治的吗？

en: Granny Pig: And the little curtains are for your tree house.
cn: 猪奶奶：这些小窗帘就是给你们树屋用的。

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 小猪佩奇：万岁！

en: Narrator: Peppa and George love their tree house.
cn: 旁白：佩奇和乔治喜欢他们的树屋。

en: Peppa Pig: Thank you, Granny Pig. Thank you, Grandpa Pig.
cn: 小猪佩奇：谢谢奶奶，谢谢爷爷。

en: Grandpa Pig: Who wants to go inside first?
cn: 猪爷爷：谁想先进去？

sentence.en: Who wants to go inside first?

examples.en: Who wants to play with the ball first?
examples.cn: 谁想先玩球？

examples.en: Who wants to try the new game first?
examples.cn: 谁想先试试这个新游戏？

en: Peppa Pig: Me, me!
cn: 小猪佩奇：我，我！

en: Grandpa Pig: In you go then.
cn: 猪爷爷：那你进去吧。

en: Peppa Pig: Before I go in my tree house I must take off my muddy boots.
cn: 小猪佩奇：进树屋前我要脱掉我的泥靴。

en: Peppa Pig: I’m in my tree house.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我在我的树屋里。

examples.en: I’m in my room.
examples.cn: 我在我的房间里。

examples.en: I’m in the garden.
examples.cn: 我在花园里。

en: Peppa Pig: I’m in my tree house.
cn: 小猪佩奇：我在我的树屋里。

en: Daddy Pig: George, would you like to go in the tree house, too?
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，你也想进树屋吗？

sentence.en: Would you like to go in the tree house, too?

examples.en: Would you like to play with us?
examples.cn: 你想和我们一起玩吗？

examples.en: Would you like to join the game?
examples.cn: 你想加入游戏吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, who is it?
cn: 小猪佩奇：谁呀？

en: Daddy Pig: A young pig named George would like to pay a visit. Can he come in?
cn: 猪爸爸：有个叫乔治的小猪想来拜访，可以进来吗？

en: Peppa Pig: As long as he takes off his muddy boots.
cn: 小猪佩奇：只要他脱掉泥靴就可以。

sentence.en: As long as he takes off his muddy boots.
sentence.cn: 只要他脱掉泥靴就可以。

examples.en: You can join the game as long as you follow the rules.
examples.cn: 只要你遵守规则，你就可以参加游戏。

examples.en: You can come to the party as long as you bring a gift.
examples.cn: 只要你带礼物，你就可以来参加派对。

en: Daddy Pig: George, take your boots off. Then you can visit Peppa in the tree house.
cn: 猪爸爸：乔治，脱掉你的靴子，你就可以去树屋找佩奇了。

en: Peppa Pig: Who is it?
cn: 小猪佩奇：谁呀？

en: Peppa Pig: George?
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治？

en: Peppa Pig: Yes, who is it?
cn: 小猪佩奇：谁呀？

en: Mummy Pig: It’s Mummy Pig. Have you room for any more visitors?
cn: 猪妈妈：是妈妈。还有地方再进来一个人吗？

sentence.en: Have you room for any more visitors?
sentence.cn: 还有地方再进来一个人吗？

examples.en: Have you room for one more player?
examples.cn: 还有地方再进来一个玩家吗？

examples.en: Have you room for another guest?
examples.cn: 还有地方再进来一个客人吗？

en: Peppa Pig: Mmm? You have to say the secret words. Then you can come into our house.
cn: 小猪佩奇：嗯？你得说暗号才能进来。

en: Mummy Pig: I see. And what are the secret words?
cn: 猪妈妈：我明白了。暗号是什么？

en: Peppa Pig: I have to whisper them to you. The secret words are: “Daddy’s big tummy.”
cn: 小猪佩奇：我得悄悄告诉你。暗号是：‘爸爸的大肚子’。

en: Mummy Pig: I see.
cn: 猪妈妈：我知道了。

en: Peppa Pig: Say the secret words.
cn: 小猪佩奇：说暗号。

en: Mummy Pig: Daddy’s big tummy.
cn: 猪妈妈：爸爸的大肚子。

en: Peppa Pig: That’s right! Daddy’s big tummy!
cn: 小猪佩奇：对！爸爸的大肚子！

en: Daddy Pig: I think those are silly secret words.
cn: 猪爸爸：我觉得这个暗号太傻了。

sentence.en: I think those are silly secret words.
sentence.cn: 我觉得这个暗号太傻了。

examples.en: I think that’s a silly idea.
examples.cn: 我觉得这是个傻主意。

examples.en: I think those are silly rules.
examples.cn: 我觉得这些规则很傻。

en: Peppa Pig: Mummy, before you come in our house you must take off your boots.
cn: 小猪佩奇：妈妈，进屋前你要脱掉靴子。

en: Mummy Pig: Of course.
cn: 猪妈妈：当然。

en: Peppa Pig: There’s room for Daddy, too.
cn: 小猪佩奇：还有爸爸的位置。

en: Peppa Pig: Say the secret words, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：爸爸，说暗号。

en: Daddy Pig: Can I have different secret words, please?
cn: 猪爸爸：我能不能换个暗号？

sentence.en: Can I have different secret words, please?

examples.en: Can I have a different color, please?
examples.cn: 我能不能换个颜色？

examples.en: Can I have a different flavor, please?
examples.cn: 我能不能换个口味？

en: Mummy Pig, Peppa Pig and George: No.
cn: 猪妈妈、佩奇和乔治：不行。

en: Daddy Pig: Oh, all right.
cn: 猪爸爸：好吧。

en: Daddy Pig: Daddy’s big tummy.
cn: 猪爸爸：爸爸的大肚子。

en: Peppa Pig: That’s right. You can come in now, Daddy. Take your boots off.
cn: 小猪佩奇：对了，爸爸，你现在可以进来了，记得脱靴子。

en: Daddy Pig: I don’t think I can fit through the door.
cn: 猪爸爸：我觉得我进不去门。

sentence.en: I don’t think I can fit through the door.

examples.en: I don’t think I can fit in this chair.
examples.cn: 我觉得我坐不下这个椅子。

examples.en: I don’t think I can fit in that car.
examples.cn: 我觉得我坐不下那辆车。

en: Peppa Pig: That’s because your tummy’s too big.
cn: 小猪佩奇：那是因为你的肚子太大了。

en: Grandpa Pig: I know. Daddy Pig can climb in through the top.
cn: 猪爷爷：我有办法，爸爸可以从上面爬进来。

en: Narrator: Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are all in the tree house.
cn: 旁白：佩奇、乔治、猪妈妈和猪爸爸都在树屋里。

en: Peppa Pig: Granny, I love our tree house. I don’t want to ever come out.
cn: 小猪佩奇：奶奶，我喜欢我们的树屋，我不想出来。

sentence.en: I don’t want to ever come out.

examples.en: I don’t want to ever leave this place.
examples.cn: 我不想离开这个地方。

examples.en: I don’t want to ever stop playing.
examples.cn: 我不想停止玩耍。

en: Granny Pig: That’s nice, Peppa. But are you sure you don’t want to visit me in my house?
cn: 猪奶奶：真好，佩奇。但你确定不来我家看看吗？

sentence.en: Are you sure you don’t want to visit me in my house?
sentence.cn: 你确定不来我家看看吗？

examples.en: Are you sure you don’t want to play with us?
examples.cn: 你确定不想和我们一起玩吗？

examples.en: Are you sure you don’t want to try this food?
examples.cn: 你确定不想尝尝这个食物吗？

en: Peppa Pig: No, thank you, Granny.
cn: 小猪佩奇：不用了，谢谢奶奶。

en: Granny Pig: In that case Grandpa Pig and I will just have to eat my homemade cookies all by ourselves.
cn: 猪奶奶：那爷爷和我只好自己吃我做的饼干了。

en: Peppa Pig: Cookies!
cn: 小猪佩奇：饼干！

en: Peppa Pig: Granny Pig!
cn: 小猪佩奇：奶奶！

en: Granny Pig: Here are my homemade cookies. But if you want to come in you have to say the secret words.
cn: 猪奶奶：这是我做的饼干，但想进来要说暗号。

sentence.en: If you want to come in you have to say the secret words.

examples.en: If you want to play, you have to follow the rules.
examples.cn: 想玩就得遵守规则。

examples.en: If you want to join us, you have to agree to our terms.
examples.cn: 想加入我们，你得同意我们的条件。

en: Peppa Pig: That’s easy. Daddy’s big tummy!
cn: 小猪佩奇：这很简单，爸爸的大肚子！

en: Granny Pig: That’s right.
cn: 猪奶奶：对了。

en: Daddy Pig: Well I still think that those are very silly secret words.
cn: 猪爸爸：不过我还是觉得这个暗号很傻。

sentence.en: I still think that those are very silly secret words.
sentence.cn: 我还是觉得这个暗号很傻。

examples.en: I still think that’s a silly idea.
examples.cn: 我还是觉得这是个傻主意。

examples.en: I still think those are silly rules.
examples.cn: 我还是觉得这些规则很傻。
